body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.3 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Improved support for right-to-left text.
Support for CMYK JPEG images.
Beginnings of a Game Explorer implementation.
Improved 64-bit support in MSI.
Stub inetcpl control panel applet.
A number of fixes to crypto support.
Translation updates.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
